    • Uses of DrawingSurface in tumble.gui.buttons

      Methods in tumble.gui.buttons with parameters of type DrawingSurface 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void RestartButton.mouseReleased(float mouseX, float mouseY, DrawingSurface surface)
      Clears all progress in game.
      void PlayButton.mouseReleased(float mouseX, float mouseY, DrawingSurface surface)
      Switches screen to game screen.
      void PauseButton.mouseReleased(float mouseX, float mouseY, DrawingSurface surface)
      Switches screen to pause screen.
      void MuteButton.mouseReleased(float mouseX, float mouseY, DrawingSurface surface)
      Toggles this game's sound.
